meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: މާލެ ބަދަލުވުމަށްފަހު އާ އެކުވެރިންގެ ގްރޫޕަކާއެކު ވަގުތު ހޭދަކުރަން ފެށިއެވެ.
